excerpt: For those of you who know Processing or jQuery… I know, that is two totally different things, but check out what John Resig (the creator of jQuery) just conjured up: Processing.js. I think I can safely say: WHAAAAAAAAAAA?!!!
title: Processing.js
content: For those of you who know Processing or jQuery… I know, that is two totally different things, but check out what John Resig (the creator of jQuery) just conjured up: Processing.js. I think I can safely say: WHAAAAAAAAAAA?!!!
